title: Wild about wilderness
creator_credit: David Greig and Kestrel Films & Video (Australia)
brief_description: Debora Conway hosts this video which attempts to define wilderness areas that are left. All wilderness areas shown are from New South Wales. Finishes with the sobering thought that what we don’t save now is lost for ever.
